adblock_click_for_details.description: Tooltip on the AdBlock button, to help users understand that they can click the button, and that they can control the number badge that appears on the button.

reportpubliclyavailable.message: Ne zaboravi: tvoj izveštaj može postati javno dostupan. Imaj to na umu pre uključivanja nečeg privatnog.
reportpubliclyavailable.description: Ad report page string, when you're about to submit a report

thirdparty.description: Resource list column title telling if the resource originates from a different domain

chromebutton_how_to_hide2.message: Ako želite da sakrijte dugme, kliknite na njega desnim klikom i izaberite Sakrij Dugme. Možete ga prikazati opet pod chrome://chrome/extensions.
chromebutton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Hide Button' should match the text that Chrome displays when you right click a toolbar button.

sliderexplanation.message: Pomerite klizač dok je reklama ispravno blokirana na stranici, i blokirani element izgleda korisno.

blacklisteroptions1.message: Šta mislite da će biti tačno što se tiče ove reklame svaki put kad posetite stranicu?

blacklisterthefilter.message: Filter, koji se može promeni na strani sa podešavanjima:

blacklisteroptionstitle.message: Poslednji korak: Sta čini ovo reklamom?

blacklisternofilter.description: Warning if the user hasn't specified a filter

blacklistereditfilter.message: Molimo ukucajte pravilni filter ispod i pritisnite OK
blacklistereditfilter.description: Text if the user wants to manually edit a filter. 'OK' is the standard javascript popup button text.

blacklistereditinvalid1.description: Messagebox if the manually edited filter is invalid. Error messages are not translated.

blacklisterblockedelement.description: Tells the user what the blocked element is on the slider page

blacklisterwarningnofilter.description: Warns the user that no filter was specified

blacklisterblocksalloftype.message: Pazite: ovaj filter blokira sve $elementtype$ elemente na strani!
blacklisterblocksalloftype.description: Warns the user that all elements of type X will be blocked

blacklistersinglematch.message: To odgovara jednoj stavci na ovoj strani.
blacklistersinglematch.description: Tells the user only one match was found

blacklistermatches.message: Ima $matchcount$ takve stavke na ovoj strani.
blacklistermatches.description: Tells the user multiple matches were found

buttonback.description: Back to previous wizard page button

findingads.message:
Pronalaženje reklama...

Ovo će potrajati samo malo.
findingads.description: When you press ctrl-shift-K the blacklister searches for ads

blockanadtitle.description: Title of the first two dialogs of the blacklister

clickthead.message: Pritisnite na reklamu, i ja ću vam objasniti kako da je blokirate.
clickthead.description: When you have to click the ad to continue

adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.description: Message displayed when the whitelister dialog will whitelist part of an entire website, for example '*.google.com/reader/*'.  The URL will appear on the next line.

you_can_slide_to_change.message: Možete da pomerite klizač ispod kako biste odredili tačno na kojim stranicama AdBlock neće raditi.
you_can_slide_to_change.description: Instructions for how to use the whitelister slider controls. Sometimes only one slider will show, and sometimes two will show, and if possible the text should handle both cases.

whitelistertitle2.description: The title of the whitelister dialog

buttonexclude.description: Button for excluding a domain in the whitelister dialog

tabgeneral.description: A tab on the options page

tabfilterlists.description: A tab on the options page

tabcustomize.description: A tab on the options page

betalabel.description: Label for beta features in AdBlock Options

debuginlogoption.message: Prikaži izjave uklanjanja greške u zapisu konzole (usporava AdBlock)
debuginlogoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

invalidListUrl.description: Message when you subscribe to a non-list URL

removefromlist.description: Label to remove a custom filter

you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.message: Što više filter lista koristite, to je AdBlock sporiji. Korišćenje previše lista mogu čak da blokiraju vaš pretraživač na nekim veb sajtovima. Kliknite OK da koristite ovu listu svejedno.
you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to subscribe to too many lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.

filterstabtitle.description: Title of the filter list tab

filterlistlink.message: Nemojte se prijavljivati na više nego vam je potrebno -- svaki filter dodatno usporava AdBlock! Zasluge i druge liste možete pronaći ovde.

filterrussian.description: Language names for a filter list

filterczech.description: Language names for a filter list

blacklistclickmessage.message: Kliknite desnim klikom na reklamu da je blokirate -- ili je blokirajte ovde ručno.
blacklistclickmessage.description: Message at the top of the blacklist options tab

filterlistsrock.message: Liste filtera blokiraju većinu reklama na internetu. Možete takođe:
filterlistsrock.description: Header text on the Customize tab. 'Filter lists' should be the same text as the name of the 'Filter lists' tab.

linkunblock.message: Prikazuje reklame na veb strani ili domenu

blockurlwithtext.message: Blokiraj URL-ove koji sadže ovaj tekst

excludedomainorurl.message: Domen ili url gde AdBlock ne treba da blokira bilo sta

blockdomain.message: Domen strane na kojoj se primenjuje
blockdomain.description: Message of the url and css -blocking area

filtersavewarning.message:
Budite pažljivi: ukoliko napravite grešku ovde mnogo drugih filtera, uključujući i oficijalne filtere, mogu da prestanu da rade kako treba!
Pročitajte sintaksni vodič za filtere kako bi naučili da dodajete napredne filtere zabranjujućih i dopuštajućih lista.

adblockreportinganad.description: Title of the ad report page

adreport2.message:
Znači, upravo ste pronašli reklamu na veb strani? Pa, ja ću vam pomoći da pronađete pravo mesto da je prijavite!
Ne zaboravite: prijavljivanje reklama je dobrovoljno. Ukoliko ne želite da to uradite možete da zatvorite ovaj prozor i da je blokirate samo za sebe tako što dodate njen filter u 'Modifikuj' tab-u strane sa opcijama!
adreport2.description: Instructions on ad reporting page. 'Customize' should be the same text as the name of the 'Customize' tab.

updateyourlists.message: Proverite da li su vaše liste filtera ažurirane
updateyourlists.description: Section header on the ad report page

adstillappear.message: Da li je reklama i dalje vidljiva?

yes.description: A positive response to a question

no.description: A negative response to a question

adalreadyblocked.message: Ne morate ništa da uradite pošto je reklama već blokirana
adalreadyblocked.description: On the ad report page, telling a user there is nothing to do

disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.message: Isključite 'Omogućeno' polje za potvrdu pored svakog priključka osim AdBlock-a. Ostavite da AdBlock bude uključen.
disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.description: Step 2 for disabling Chrome and Safari extensions

disableforsafaristepone.message: Kliknite na Safari meni → Podešavanja → Extenzije.

reenableadsonebyone.message: Sada kada više nema reklama, morate saznati koje proširenje je uzrok. Pređite i omogućite svako proširenje jedno po jedno. Proširenje koje vrati reklamu/reklame je ono koje morate da obrišete da bi se oslobodili reklama.
reenableadsonebyone.description: Tells the user to reenable the extensions one by one

correctfilters.description: On the ad report page, label describing having the right set of filters

pagelanguagecheck.message: Na kom jeziku je stranica napisana?

nodefaultfilter1.message:
Mi nemamo standardnu listu filtera za taj jezik.
Molimo pokušajte da pronađete odgovarajuću listu koja podržava ovaj jezik $link$ ili blokirajte ovu reklamu sami u 'Modifikuj' tab-u.
nodefaultfilter1.description: Instructions on ad report page pointing users to EasyList subscriptions list. 'Customize' should be the same text as the name of the 'Customize' tab.

retryaftersubscribe.message: Prijavite se na ovu listu filtera, onda pokušajte ponovo: $list_title$
retryaftersubscribe.description: Instructions on ad report page telling users to subscribe to a filter list and then check again to see whether the ad exists

checkinfirefoxtitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Firefox/Chrome

chrome.example: 'or Chrome' (This will only be shown in Safari. Chrome users will not see this.)

checkinfirefox_1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

chrome.example: 'or Chrome' (This will only be shown in Safari. Chrome users will not see this.)

checkinfirefox_2.message: Instalirajte Adblock Plus za Firefox $chrome$ ukoliko ga nemate.
checkinfirefox_2.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad.

chrome.example: 'or AdBlock for Chrome' (This will only be shown in Safari. Chrome users will not see this.)

checkinfirefox_3.message: U tom pretraživaču, prijavite se na iste liste filtera koje imate ovde (osim AdBlock Modifikovanih filtera u FireFox-u).
checkinfirefox_3.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_4.message: U tom pretraživaču, učitajte stranu sa reklamom.
checkinfirefox_4.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_5.message: Da li se reklama takođe pojavljuje u tom pretraživaču?
checkinfirefox_5.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

refusetocheck.description: User is telling us they don't wish to investigate something for us

reportfilterlistproblem.message: Ovo je problem liste filtera. Prijavi ga ovde: $link$
reportfilterlistproblem.description: Telling the user to report an ad to a filter list maintainer

link.example: EXAMPLE 1: John Doe EXAMPLE 2: EasyList forums

reporttous2.message: Ukoliko govorite Engleski, možete prijaviti reklamu nama u tragaču problema.
reporttous2.description: NOTE: non-English translations should replace the first sentence and instead say 'If you can speak English, you can report the ad to us in the issue tracker.'

fixityourself.message: OK, i dalje možete da blokirate ovu reklamu za sebe na strani sa podešavanjima. Hvala!
fixityourself.description: Telling users who won't report an ad to us how to handle it for themselves

adblock_outdated_chrome.message: Koristite staru verziju AdBlock-a. Molimo idite do strane za prijključke, uključite 'Režim razvojnika' i kliknite na 'Ažuriraj priključke sada'
adblock_outdated_chrome.description: Ad report page instructions to update AdBlock in Chrome. The link will point to 'chrome://chrome/extensions/'

block_an_ad_on_this_page.description: Toolbar button menu entry and context menu entry

wildcardhint.message: Beleška: možete koristiti * kao višeznačnik ovde

novalidurlpattern.message: Molimo unesite validan URL obrazac za proveru!

doesntmatchoriginal.message: Obrazac koji ste uneli ne odgovara resursu koji ste pokušali da blokirate! Nastaviti svejedno?

thirdpartycheckbox.message: Bilo koji veb sajt OSIM veb sajtova na domenu $domain$

filterhasbeenadded.message:
Filter je uspešno dodat!
Učitajte stranicu ponovo da vidite rezultat!

adblock_is_paused.message: AdBlock je pauziran. Zbog toga resursi nisu zahvaćeni, pa se ova strana ne može koristiti. Prvo isljučite pauzu pa pokušajte ponovo.

excludefilterremoved.message: Filter je uklonjen. Molimo ponovo učitajte originalnu stranu radi generisanja liste sa resursima.
excludefilterremoved.description: Warning when a page exclusion rule was removed in resourceblock.html

noresourcessend2.message: Nešto je krenulo naopako. Nijedan resurs nije prošao. Ova strana će se sada zatvoriti. Pokušajte da ponovo učitate sajt.

resourcedomain.description: Text shown when hovering over an item in the third-party column

resourceiswhitelisted.message: Izabran resurs je dopušten. Zbog toga ga ne možete blokirati.

selectresources.message: Izaberite resurs koji bi hteli da blokirate ili dopustite

appliedwhenbrowsing.message: Ovaj filter će biti primenjen kada posećujete:

multipledomainshint.message: Odvojite više domena sa zarezima ili razmacima

casesensitive.message: Ovaj filter je osetljiv na veličinu slova:

onlyresourcetypes.message: Ovaj filter se primenjuje na resurse ove vrste:

flashads.description: Title of the final ad report question if the ad didn't appear in Firefox

cantblockflashwarning.message: Da li se ova reklama vidi u filmu ili ispred filma ili nekog drugog priključka poput igre u Flash-u?
cantblockflashwarning.description: Text of the final ad report question

cantblockflash.message: Ne možemo još da blokiramo reklame unutar Flash-a i ostalih priključaka. Čekamo podršku pretraživača i WebKit-a.
cantblockflash.description: Result of the final ad report question

disabled_by_filter_lists.message: Izvinite, AdBlock je onesposobljen na ovoj strani zbog jedne od vaših lista filtera.
disabled_by_filter_lists.description: Message shown when a user tries to unwhitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list

status_disabled.message: AdBlock ne može da radi na ovom domenu.
status_disabled.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that disallow extensions, such as the Extensions Gallery or about:blank

dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.message: Nemoj pokretati na stranama ovog domena
dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.description: Menu entry to open the whitelist wizard

disabled_on_this_page.message: AdBlock je onesposobljen na ovoj strani.
disabled_on_this_page.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that have been whitelisted

status_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is paused

dont_run_on_this_page.description: Menu entry to whitelist a page

options.description: The text of the link on chrome://chrome/extensions that gets you to the Options page for an extension

hide_this_button.description: Toolbar button menu entry to hide the AdBlock button

removelabel.description: Link to remove a filter on the resourceblock page

changelabel.description: Link to change resources on the resourceblock page

translator_credit.description: Will be followed by a list of translator names (separate string)

report_ad_on_page.description: Entry in the AdBlock button menu

show_resourcelist.description: Entry in the AdBlock button menu

work_around_hulu_problems.message: Zaobiđite videe sa Hulu.com koji ne rade (zahteva restartovanje pretraživača)
work_around_hulu_problems.description: Advanced Options page checkbox, which users only need to use if Hulu.com videos break. It directs the user to restart their browser in order for changes to the checkbox to take effect.

modifydomain.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the domain part of a URL

modifypath.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the path part of a URL

show_ads_except_for.message: Prikaži reklame svuda osim na ovim domenima...
show_ads_except_for.description: Section title for blacklisting section of Customize tab

only_block_ads_on_these_sites.message: Blokiraj samo reklame na ovim sajtovima:
only_block_ads_on_these_sites.description: Label for textbox where user enters a list of sites on Customize tab

format_site1_site2_site3.description: Example showing users how to input a list of sites on the Customize tab. You can translate the 'news' and 'siteN' but leave the '|'s and '~'s in place.

warning_overrules_filters.message:
Upozorenje: na svim ostalim sajtovima ćete videti reklame!
Ovo poništava sve ostale filtere za te sajtove.
warning_overrules_filters.description: Message on the 'Customize' tab of the options page, explaining the danger of adding a blacklisting filter

storage_quota_exceeded.message: Prekoračili ste nivo skladištenja kori AdBlock može da koristi. Molimo obustavite praćenje nekih lista filtera!
storage_quota_exceeded.description: Message shown when the user uses more storage than allowed by the browser

safari50_updatenotice.message: Koristite staru verziju Safarija. Nabavite najnoviju verziju da bi koristili dugme AdBlock-a na panelu sa alatkama da bi pauzirali AdBlock, omogućili prikaz reklama na određenim veb sajtovima, i kako bi prijavili reklame.
safari50_updatenotice.description: A message shown to Safari 5.0 users urging them to upgrade

searchexplanation.message: Koristite * da bi pronašli nula nijedno ili više slova. Na primer, 'zastava*.gif slika' pronalazi slike 'zastava.gif', 'zastava123.gif', i 'zastavaxyz.gif'.
searchexplanation.description: Text in resourceblock when you hover your mouse over the search textbox

searchplaceholder.description: Text in resourceblock shown in the search textbox before you type something

nosearchresults.description: Text in resourceblock shown if no results are found after searching

custompattern.description: Label in front of the 'custom block pattern' textbox in resourceblock, after clicking a resource

filterorigin.description: Tooltip of matching filter in resources list, telling which filter list contains the filter

list.example: A filter list name OR AdBlock OR the translation of 'tabcustomize'

firefox_explanation.message: Svrha ovog pitanja je da se odredi ko bi trebao da primi vaš izveštaj. Ukoliko odgovorite na ovo pitanje pogrešno, izveštaj će biti poslat pogrešnim ljudima, pa može biti ignorisan.
firefox_explanation.description: Explanation of the Check-in-Firefox or Chrome step in the ad reporter

blocked_ads.description: Title for popup menu section showing number of ads blocked

blocked_n_on_this_page.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked on this page. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999.

count.example: The number of ads blocked. Do not make any changes to this placeholder when translating.

blocked_n_in_total.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked since AdBlock was installed. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999,999,999.

count.example: The number of ads blocked. Do not make any changes to this placeholder when translating.

show_on_adblock_button.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked

adblockinglist.description: List for subscribed ad blocking fiters

otherfilters.description: List for other filters the user subscribed to

customfilters.description: List for custom filters the user subscribed to

whats_this.description: Text of a link pointing to the explanation of a new feature

selectlanguage.description: Text for the first option in Langage Dropdown for Filter Lists tab in options. Include the ' -- ' on either side of your translation.
